title: Chiropractic
cleaned_text: CHIROPRACTIC Itamar Brim Type of Healing Offered Chiropractic Format of Healing Sessions Gentle hands-on chiropractic care Locations of Healing Sessions Ramat Beit Shemesh, Ezrat Torah, and Meah Shearim Preferred & Other Contact Info 054-844-1423; [[email protected]](https://saramalka.com/healers-in-israel/docbrim@gmail.com) Hours of Contact Call whenever you want; if I am not available I will call back. What Can You Help Heal? Chiropractic removes the interference that stops the body from healing itself Who Is This Healing Best For? Everyone should be checked periodically by a Chiropractor What Makes This Type of Healing Work? Hashem Where Did You Learn This Healing (List courses, etc.)?
